column7: Ah but you must know I'll never turn away an offering, and on the contrary, I've often half a mind to pay it back right then and there. Like now!
Such finery as this demands that I respond in kind, young man; so I want you to have something from me, no, I insist.
How do you do, young man.
I am most pleased to see you, Zagreus.
How fares my brother's son of late?
Well I don't see why not.
A small token of my affection.
Please accept a little gift from me.
This, my nephew, is for you.
A bit of foresight could have prevented that.
Perhaps I shouldn't have expected more.
No way could that have been intentional.
Now that did not go well.
Don't be a fool, young man.
You truly are my brother's son.
I thought you knew better than this.
Best not to make me angry, my nephew.
No need for further conversation now.
I've other matters to attend to, thanks.
Try me again some other time perhaps.
Why, I can scarce believe this...!
Your talent shines as ever, there, Nephew.
You've quite a knack for this!
Why, I can scarce believe this...!
How do you do, young man.
I am most pleased to see you, Zagreus.
How fares my brother's son of late?
Well I don't see why not.
A small token of my affection.
Please accept a little gift from me.
This, my nephew, is for you.
A bit of foresight could have prevented that.
Perhaps I shouldn't have expected more.
No way could that have been intentional.
Now that did not go well.
Don't be a fool, young man.
You truly are my brother's son.
I thought you knew better than this.
Best not to make me angry, my nephew.
No need for further conversation now.
I've other matters to attend to, thanks.
Try me again some other time perhaps.
Why, I can scarce believe this...!
Your talent shines as ever, there, Nephew.
You've quite a knack for this!
Why, I can scarce believe this...!
Now wasn't that a simple test, Nephew?
Not the hardest choice you've ever made!
Congratulations, you made the right choice!
Ah, young man, you hurt somebody's feelings!
Now is the time to strike!
Hoh, you watch this, young man!
I'll strike them down right now!
I can take care of that!
I ought to strike you down!
Now you ask my favor, Zagreus?
A swift death is a mercy of a retribution.
I did not become ruler of Olympus by forgiving trespasses, young man.

I say, Big Brother! You and your better half put on a positively smashing night! It's a relief, for all of us, knowing Persephone is safe and sound. And mother to as noble of a son as my good nephew, there!
Oh, haha, of course, of course, Hades! Now, then, farewell! And let us keep in better touch, from here!
